The Times said federal investigators have sought to interview former employees of the now-defunct political-data company, as well as banks that handled its business.
The FBI and the U.S. Justice Department are investigating Cambridge Analytica's business practices, the New York Times reported late Tuesday.
The Times said the investigation is in its early stages and few details have been divulged.
Cambridge Analytica shut its doors earlier this month.
